products.name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Comfortable 100% cotton t-shirt perfect for everyday wear. Breathable fabric with a classic fit.

products.name: Women's Slim Fit Jeans
products.description: Stylish slim fit jeans with stretch denim for maximum comfort. Features a mid-rise waist and classic 5-pocket design.

products.name: Hooded Sweatshirt
products.description: Cozy fleece-lined hoodie with adjustable drawstring and kangaroo pocket. Perfect for casual wear.

products.name: Floral Summer Dress
products.description: Light and airy summer dress with beautiful floral print. Features a flattering A-line silhouette and adjustable straps.

products.name: Men's Leather Jacket
products.description: Premium genuine leather jacket with classic biker style. Features multiple pockets and a comfortable inner lining.

products.name: Athletic Performance Shorts
products.description: Moisture-wicking athletic shorts with built-in liner. Lightweight and breathable for intense workouts.

products.name: Knit Cardigan Sweater
products.description: Soft knit cardigan with button closure. Perfect layering piece for transitional weather.

products.name: Chino Pants
products.description: Versatile cotton chino pants with a tailored fit. Suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

products.name: Yoga Leggings
products.description: High-waisted yoga leggings with four-way stretch and moisture control. Non-see-through fabric with flattering compression.

products.name: Polo Shirt
products.description: Classic pique polo shirt with three-button placket and ribbed collar. Timeless style for any occasion.
